titles.title: To protect Saudi dissidents in the United States, and for other purposes.
Protection of Saudi Dissidents Act of 2019

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select), for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
